name: Boulder, Scroll, Shears!
description:
The second game in the game a month challenge I am attempting this year. "Boulder, Scroll, Shears!"  takes the fast paced action of Rock, Paper, Scissors and adds some fantasy RPG elements to it. 

Whoever wins in a round of BSS chooses between launching an attack or using an item. Play continues until either side is wiped out. See how far you can get each time you play! 

Each time you play is different as the game is randomly generated each time. Thanks for checking out February's game! I look forward to seeing you next month!

As with January's game, this game is free. If you like it and want to help support me as I continue working on these games feel free to pay what you like for it. Otherwise please share it with your friends!

Also, check out the development log for this game to see some of the behind the scenes thoughts that went into this game.  :D Thanks!

Special Thanks to Paul for helping me cook up this concept! ^_^
